*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, January 16, 1830. Advantages of a prompt removal to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-16-1830">Jan. 16, 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*. *p*Dr brother and Sister*/p*
*p*I again drop you a line by way of *location_mentioned*Nachitoches */location_mentioned*on the subject of your removal here. I have not time to write a long letter neither is it necessary. I have written four in the last month. All I have to say or can say may be comprised in a few words—Come remove to this *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*without delay. In *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1830">Novr next*/date_mentioned* the law expires exempting *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*from duties. Come on and bring a handsome assortment of goods. And come quickly, the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1830">fall */date_mentioned*is the best time to remove on a/c of health. When I get an answer to the application I have made of a *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*for you I will write, tho I am not doubtful as to a favourable one. *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*can now be had on reasonable terms by purchace. I am the *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned*to sell *location_mentioned*22 Leagues */location_mentioned*for $500 a League part on a credit, if you come now and bring some money and goods you may get as much as you please, in a year more *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*will rise. 200 *person_mentioned*emigrants */person_mentioned*have arrived in a month, do not be the last. Come on, and let the remnant of our *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*be united once more.*/p*
*p*My health is better and I start tomorrow with the *person_mentioned*surveyors */person_mentioned*for the *location_mentioned*woods */location_mentioned*to be out a month or more.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed to:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Potosi Missouri*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
